item.title: Concurrency: Comparing Golang's Channels to C#'s Async/Await
item.description: Comparing concurrency in Go (golang) with C#’s Async/Await.

item.title: About
item.description: Grant is a software developer from Birmingham. Graduating from university in 2009 with a 1st in Computer Science, he jumped straight into the industry coding websites and, later, mobile applications too. He doesn’t always write about himself in the third person, but when he does it’s because he wants to sound like a robot (or when he’s trying to be professional and write a bio like this). The human side of Grant likes music, cooking, running and spending time with his wife and sons.

item.title: Creating a simple metronome using Javascript and the Web Audio API
item.description: How to accurately schedule audio events when writing a time sensitive Javascript application.

item.title: Recreating the old iCloud background using Javascript and a HTML Canvas
item.description: In this post, I go through the steps I took to recreate the background that used to be on the iCloud web site - blurry bubbles!

item.title: Light and Dark theme toggle on a Laravel website
item.description: I find using a dark theme for my IDE and operating system is much easier on my eyes, so I use it wherever possible. In this post I explain how to create a toggle button to switch a Laravel website between light and dark themes.

item.title: Replacing a Danfoss TP9000 with a 3rd Generation Nest
item.description: Step by step instructions on how to wire up a 3rd generation Nest in place of a Danfoss TP9000.

item.title: Installing Lubuntu on an Acer Aspire One Cloudbook 11
item.description: I wanted a cheap laptop with a decent battery life to run a Linux distribution on and decided on the Acer Aspire One Cloudbook 11. This post details what I did after installing Lubuntu.
